abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32745101, pmid32737912, pmid32744622, pmid32749709, pmid32702150, pmid32744436, pmid32738140, pmid32749593, pmid32737466, pmid32745072
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.06
